model

Class DigramList

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DigramList.DigramList

  • public class DigramList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the DigramList for basic digrams. The DigramList is a data structure for all active digrams. Each entry in the DigramList is a Digram.
    Author:
    Matthias DÃ¼rksen

      private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> labels
      a set for the necessary different labels of the nodes in the graph.

      • containsDigramFor

        private boolean containsDigramFor(java.lang.String label1,
                                  java.lang.String label2)
        Checks if the digram list has a digram for the two labels.
        Parameters:
        label1 - start node for the digram.
        label2 - end node for the digram.
        Returns:
        true if the digram list contains the digram, else false.
